author: markt
msg: HttpServletRequest.getContextPath() should return the undecoded context path used by the user agent.

author: ggregory
msg: Add ivars to track the throwable's message and localized message since the real Throwable class may not exist in the JVM (or ClassLoader) where the proxy is derserialized. Working toward new XML and JSON Serialization and Deserialization.

author: sclassen
msg: onami-persist: reduced visibility of JndiLookupHelper and introduced interface for PersistenceFilter
